overview: Triona is a technology leader with approaching 20 years experience in the Mobile Data and Telecommunications Industries. She was a pioneer in the SMS world and has architected the data networks of some of the largest mobile operators globally. Previously, she held a number of senior management positions within Aldiscon and subsequently Logica following its acquisition of Aldiscon in 1997. She moved to the US in 1998 where she was CTO for Logica North America and devised and executed a product strategy that resulted in 77% market capture for Logica’s SMS, OTA and Prepaid suite of products. In addition, Triona was previously co-founder and CTO of ANAM Mobile a mobile software company which offered the patented ‘Smart Services’ products, a suite of advanced mobile messaging services. Triona holds a Bachelor of Science in Computer Systems from University of Limerick, Ireland.
